name: DigiLord INC.
description:
There is a SECRET ENDING in the game. Please, send me a screen of secret ending screen on Twitter and I'll mention you in devlog about this game on my channel. Congrats to all, who found it.

DigiLord INC. is a game about ruling the country by choosing one of the three possible answers and making desicions, consequences of which are unclear. Spend unlimited money, keep track of your trust value and make any decisions you want in your own Digital Country.

Remember: the less money you spent, the greater your success.

And also, don't forget that life of politician is all about stopping and backing down at the right moment, so sometimes less is more.

Game for #BTPGameJam with theme: less is more.

Disigned in minimalistic mobilesque style and mobile-friendly for this same reason. 

There are 73 original questions, 16 different quest lines made of this questions,

Music by timbeek.com, huge shout out to him. His music is great! Music used in the game are called "Try and Solve This (1:50)" and you can find it here.
